title: CustomField DatePicker.fragment
content:
# CustomField-DatePicker.fragment.xml

```xml
<core:FragmentDefinition xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns="sap.m" xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout" xmlns:commons="sap.suite.ui.commons">
        <DateRangeSelection
			id="DRS3"
			showFooter="true"
            enabled ="{= ${ui>/editMode} === 'Editable'}"
            from = "{validFrom}"
            secondDateValue = "{validTo}"
			/>
</core:FragmentDefinition>
```
